title: Couple With Heart Person Man Medium Light Skin Tone Light Skin Tone
alsoKnownAs: Couple with Heart: Person, Man, Light Skin Tone
description: Represents a romantic couple, specifically a person and a man, with both individuals having light skin tones. It signifies love, romance, partnership, and affection between two people.
apple_vendor_description: This heartwarming emoji on Apple devices portrays a loving couple, a man with a medium-light skin tone and another man with a light skin tone, embraced by a red heart. The design features Apple‚Äôs signature glossy 3D shading and realistic lighting, giving the figures and the heart a soft, inviting glow.  The smooth, rounded forms and gentle expressions, combined with the prominent heart, powerfully symbolize romantic love, strong relationships, and deep affection between two men.
